about_the_game:
Welcome to Ice Truckers, an immersive transportation simulation, set in the unforgiving environment of a remote arctic island. Take control of versatile trucks, while facing dynamic and ever-changing weather conditions. Deliver cargo for different companies, expand your fleet with specialized vehicles and complete dynamic delivery missions in a stunning open world.

Navigate through a huge, 256km² large open-world, where dynamic weather and time-of-day changes keep you on your toes. From dense forests to vast frozen tundras, every corner of this island holds new challenges and opportunities. Snowstorms, blizzards, and ice-covered paths are just some of the obstacles that stand between you and your destination. The dynamic weather system ensures that no two trips are ever the same, having you stay alert at all times.

Feel the weight and power of massive, heavily-loaded trucks with different kinds of trailers and loads, as you tackle the toughest terrain. Ice Truckers features a variety of trucks, each with its own handling characteristics and First- or Third-Person View.

Expand your vehicle fleet by spending your hard-earned cash, ensuring you have the right vehicle for every task! Expand your headquarters to optimize your operations and bring yet another job to a successful end!

Engage with intriguing characters and increase your standing with different factions, by completing a wide range of critical missions, from delivering essential supplies to remote research stations, to helping companies increase their profits.

Unlock new vehicles, cargo and missions by raising your reputation with the various companies who compete for control over the area.

Your cargo is crucial for the survival of those isolated in the harsh northern wilderness. Every successful delivery is a step closer to keep the islands inhabitants’ operations running smoothly.

FEATURES

  • Many different Trucks, Trailers and Cargos

  • Detailed Vehicle Interiors and Exteriors

  • A 256m² large open-world island with varied terrain, dynamic weather and day-night-cycles

  • Challenging missions that test your driving skills and decision-making

  • Different companies and factions with an intricate reputation system

  • Random events that can change how a mission progresses in an instant, such as avalanches that block the road, broken-down cars or roadkill

Are you ready to get in your truck and take over the frozen north with your driving skills? Your Arctic Adventure awaits!
